summary: A psychiatrist searches for insight into the life of his father, who was an acclaimed children's author. But he is shocked when his journey leads him to believe that the fantasy-land his father wrote about might actually exist.
cast: Aaron Eckhart|Ian McKellen|Brittany Murphy|Nick Nolte|Jessica Lange|William Hurt|Bill Bellamy|Alan Cumming|Vera Farmiga|Michael Moriarty|Ken Roberts|Cynthia Stevenson|Lorena Gale|Tabitha St. Germain|Tim Henry|Joe Macaluso|Andrew Airlie|Eileen Pedde|Ryan Drescher|Cassandra Sawtell|Jim Eckhart|Richard Hendery|Johanna Osborne|Aaron Stephens|Suzanne Bastien|Camille Sullivan|Mark Tisdale
title: El libro mágico
